ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_simprl | |- ( ( ( A e. RR* /\ B e. RR ) /\ ( -oo < A /\ A <_ B ) ) -> -oo < A ) |

| 4 |  | #P_rexr | |- ( B e. RR -> B e. RR* ) |
| 5 |  | #P_pnfxr | |- +oo e. RR* |
| 6 |  | #P_xrlelttr | |- ( ( A e. RR* /\ B e. RR* /\ +oo e. RR* ) -> ( ( A <_ B /\ B < +oo ) -> A < +oo ) ) |

| 14 | 1, 11, 13 | #P_mpbir2and | |- ( ( ( A e. RR* /\ B e. RR ) /\ ( -oo < A /\ A <_ B ) ) -> A e. RR ) |
